Building a makeshift shelter using natural materials such as branches, leaves, and vines. This will provide protection from the elements and help you stay warm.
Finding a source of fresh water by digging a well or collecting rainwater. You can also use a solar still to purify water from seawater.
Creating a fire using a bow drill or hand drill. This will provide warmth, light, and a way to cook food.
Finding food by fishing, hunting, or foraging. You can also use traps or snares to catch animals.
Signaling for rescue by building a bonfire, using mirrors or other reflective objects to signal passing boats or planes, and using alof to attract attention.
